abstract: Brad Ziegler came into a tie ballgame for Arizona and left having allowed four runs without recording an out.
snippet: Brad Ziegler came into a tie ballgame for Arizona and left having allowed four runs without recording an out.
lead_paragraph: You cannot improve upon perfection. So here, without commentary, is a pitch-by-pitch breakdown of Brad Ziegler's relief performance for the Diamondbacks against the Brewers on Sunday.

headline.main: Bringing Gasoline and Matches from the Bullpen
